about.title: About Us
about.description: With 20 years of experience, we are your trusted technology partner in IT and technology. We continuously improve ourselves to provide the highest quality service to our customers.
about.tagline: We shape the future with technology

meta.title: About Us - ARTI 3 BİLİŞİM | 20 Years of Technology Experience
meta.description: ARTI 3 BİLİŞİM, founded in Istanbul in 2004, specializes in computer, software, hardware, project-based electrical and low current systems, providing technology solutions. With 20 years of experience, we provide corporate solutions to our customers.

hero.tagline: Single Solution for All Your Problems
hero.title: About Us
hero.description: Our company, founded in Istanbul in 2004, provides professional solutions in computer, software, hardware, electrical and low current systems with 20 years of experience.

content.paragraph1: Our company, founded in Istanbul in 2004, initially served individual customers, and in 2015, transitioned to a limited company status, moving its business areas from individual to corporate. This transformation has been an important milestone in our company's growth strategy and has enabled us to provide more comprehensive services to corporate customers.
content.paragraph2: Our company has deep expertise in computer systems, software development, hardware solutions, project-based electrical work, and low current systems. In each area, we follow the industry's leading technologies and best practices to provide our customers with the most current and effective solutions. Our expert team continuously renews itself through ongoing training and development programs and closely follows the latest developments in the industry.
content.paragraph3: Our company strives to keep our customers' efficiency at the highest level by providing solutions that will make them ready for both intra-corporate and extra-corporate integration, and advantageous in the competitive market environment through the services we provide. Thanks to our customer-oriented approach, we analyze each project's specific needs and develop customized solutions. With experienced staff, most of whom have been serving since the company's establishment, our company continues to grow sustainably by increasing employment, improving service quality, and keeping customer satisfaction at the forefront. Our 20 years of experience and strong references in the industry are our most important values that give confidence to our customers.

tagline.text: Single Solution for All Your Problems

item1.title: Foundation
item1.description: Established in Istanbul and began serving in the IT sector.
